v5.4.2.4 Change Log[26-06-2016]: Added: 1. Hindi translation for App Settings. ->This is for testing purpose before final release with Translations. 2. Support for WhatsApp Version 2.16.139 Beta
Fixed: 1. Issues with Own Avatar Mod. 2. Issues with Contact Avatar Mod. 3. Long press to copy text.
Updated: 1. String Resources for upcoming support for multiple languages for in-app options.
